snippet: There is no mystery about what New York State needs to reform its campaign finance system: do it like New York City.
abstract: Editorial applauds the proposal, backed by a coalition of powerful New Yorkers, for a public financing system for elections that would replace the current system in the state; asserts that if Gov Andrew Cuomo is serious about his promise of campaign finance reform, he now has the support necessary to accomplish it.
lead_paragraph: There is no mystery about what New York State needs to reform its campaign finance system: do it like New York City.
